Keywords: Armor , Maggia , Sinister Syndicate , Spy
Real Name: Aaron Davis
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
WALDO ARMS: Iron Spider may start the game with [SVC] #s007 Waldo Arms equipped (at no cost).
YET ANOTHER SINISTER SIX: Adjacent friendly characters with the Sinister Syndicate keyword may replace their defense value with 18.
I'VE GOT THE TALENT, THE PLAN, AND THE CREW TO PULL THIS OFF: Leadership, Outwit. When Iron Spider uses Leadership and succeeds, choose an equipped opposing character. When the chosen character is hit this turn, unequip it.

Goop
Honestly its the Waldo arms that make him good. Its an awesome equip. Him granting 18 defend and able to unequip someone anywhere on the map not needing lof or range is pretty sick also. Even better under the new rules of no pushing damage.

Coyote's Own
The damage power seem finicky. You nee to succeed at leadership and then hit. Atom can unequip by juts standing next to you.
September 30, 2020
RockyRaccoon
He’s just ok imo. Having only 5 clicks of life seems very little for 75 points, and if I wanted to equip the Waldo arms I’d rather just pay 10 more points for Superior Spider-Man who just outclasses him in every way. He seems like a decent choice for Aaron Davis to turn into though since his damage power is genuinely very strong. I’m just unsure if I’d ever want to play him on his starting click.
